title: INDIA AND US WHO CENSORED SRI LANKA AT GENEVA ARE WORST VIOLATORS OF HUMAN RIGHTS AND PERPETRATORS OF WAR CRIMES SAYS TIMES OF INDIA
content: (By  Walter Jayawardhana reporting from Los Angeles) An article written in response to what the paper said was India’s U turn in foreign policy by voting against a close ally, Sri Lanka at a United Nation Human Rights Council (UNHCR) in Geneva  warned that the “Indian government might find itself in a very uncomfortable situation…
